question: Steelers vs. Titans
description:
In the upcoming NFL game, scheduled for November 2, 8:15 PM ET:

If the Pittsburgh Steelers win, the market will resolve to “Steelers”.

If the Tennessee Titans win, the market will resolve to “Titans”.

 If the game is not completed by November 9, 2023 (11:59 PM ET) or it ends in a tie, the market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: NFL
events.description: This is a market group for NFL games happening on 2023-11-02

question: Will WeWork announce bankruptcy by November 12?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if WeWork announces that it will file for bankruptcy or has filed for bankruptcy of any variety by November 12, 2023, 11:59 PM ET.

An announcement will suffice for a "Yes" resolution, regardless of if or when the actual filing occurs.

The announcement must be made through any of their official or verified channels (e.g. https://www.wework.com/newsroom, etc.), as a recorded or written statement by their CEO, legal representation, or other individual or team which officially represents WeWork.

A definitive consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

A definitive consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: American aid to Israel by Nov 15?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if a bill granting a new aid package to Israel is signed into law in the United States by November 15, 2023, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: American aid to Israel by Nov 15?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if a bill granting a new aid package to Israel is signed into law in the United States by November 15, 2023, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will Hamas release more hostages by November 17?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Hamas releases any hostages between October 31 and November 17, 2023, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a negotiated release of hostages will trigger a "Yes" resolution.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Hamas, Israel, the United States, and/or the relevant nations to whom any potential released hostages belong, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Will Hamas release more hostages by November 17?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Hamas releases any hostages between October 31 and November 17, 2023, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a negotiated release of hostages will trigger a "Yes" resolution.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Hamas, Israel, the United States, and/or the relevant nations to whom any potential released hostages belong, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Starlink available in Gaza by Nov 30?
description: This market will resolve to "Yes" if, by November 30, 2023, 11:59 PM ET, credible reports indicate that SpaceX's Starlink has officially commenced providing internet services in Gaza. Resolution sources include but are not limited to official statements or press releases from Starlink or SpaceX, and reputable news outlets. The service must be confirmed as publicly accessible, not merely in testing or pilot stages. In the absence of such confirmation by the stated date, the market will resolve to "No". Note that early resolution is possible if the event in question transpires before the resolution date. In case of ambiguity or dispute, resolution will be decided based on the most reliable information available at the resolution time.

events.title: Starlink available in Gaza by Nov 30?
events.description: This market will resolve to "Yes" if, by November 30, 2023, 11:59 PM ET, credible reports indicate that SpaceX's Starlink has officially commenced providing internet services in Gaza. Resolution sources include but are not limited to official statements or press releases from Starlink or SpaceX, and reputable news outlets. The service must be confirmed as publicly accessible, not merely in testing or pilot stages. In the absence of such confirmation by the stated date, the market will resolve to "No". Note that early resolution is possible if the event in question transpires before the resolution date. In case of ambiguity or dispute, resolution will be decided based on the most reliable information available at the resolution time.

question: Will Hamas release 20+ hostages in a single day by Nov 15?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Hamas releases 20 or more hostages in any 24-hour period between October 31 and November 15, 2023, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a negotiated release of hostages will trigger a "Yes" resolution.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Hamas, Israel, the United States, and/or the relevant nations to whom any potential released hostages belong, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Will Hamas release 20+ hostages in a single day by Nov 15?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Hamas releases 20 or more hostages in any 24-hour period between October 31 and November 15, 2023, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a negotiated release of hostages will trigger a "Yes" resolution.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Hamas, Israel, the United States, and/or the relevant nations to whom any potential released hostages belong, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Egypt accept >1k Gazan refugees by Nov 15?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Egypt opens its border with Gaza for >1,000 Palestinian refugees by November 15, 2023, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

The "Yes" criterion includes the opening of the Rafah border crossing for refugees, the creation of a humanitarian corridor, or any other mechanism that intends to allow the passage of Palestinian refugees directly into Egypt.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the Egyptian government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.
